SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[AliquoteIVA] ( [AliquoteIVA_Ky] smallint IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [AliquoteIVA_Aliquota] money NULL , [AliquoteIVA_Descrizione] varchar(300) NULL , [AliquoteIVA_Predefinita] bit NULL , [AliquoteIVA_UserInsert] int NULL , [AliquoteIVA_UserUpdate] int NULL , [AliquoteIVA_UserDelete] int NULL , [AliquoteIVA_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [AliquoteIVA_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [AliquoteIVA_DateDelete] datetime NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[AliquoteIVA] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_AliquoteIVA PRIMARY KEY ([AliquoteIVA_Ky])
